pullRequest.title: Fix IAM showing bug with Android 6 API 23
pullRequest.bodyText:
CardView class can not be animated with a elevation (drop shadow) set beyond 0

Solution is setting the elevation of the CardView to 0 if detected device using API 23
At end of the animation we then add back the elevation necessary to show the drop shadow
For all other devices, elevation is set from start





This change is

commit.message:
Fix IAM showing bug with Android 6 API 23
* `CardView` class can not be animated with a elevation (drop shadow) set beyond 0
  * Solution is setting the elevation of the `CardView` to 0 if detected device using API 23
  * At end of the animation we then add back the elevation necessary to show the drop shadow
  * For all other devices, elevation is set from start

nodes.bodyText: shoudn't we set this only for Android 6? Since its the only case that we will listen for changes

commit.message:
Added extra check for API 23
* No need to add the `AnimationListener` to other Android API devices
